file_content.text: Experience Points
XP
You gain <<1>> experience for completing the mission.
You gain <<1>> experience for completing the bonus objective.
You gain <<1>> experience for discovering a codex.
You gain <<1>> experience for discovering all codices in a category.
You gain <<1>> experience for discovering all codices on a planet.
You gain <<1>> experience for discovering all the codices of a category on a planet.
Discovered <<1>>. You gain <<2>> experience.
Discovered <<1>>. You gain <<2>> experience.
Discovered a new area. You gain <<1>> experience.
Rested
You have entered a rest zone.
You are leaving a rest zone.
Level up!
You have gained a level. You are now level <<1>>.
You are in a rested state. While in a rested state you gain double XP. You can get into a rested state by logging out of the game in a cantina.
You gain <<1[/$d social point/$d social points]>> for completing the mission.
Bonus mission completed by your group. You receive <<1>> experience.
Bonus mission completed by your group. You receive <<1[/$d social point/$d social points]>>.
Bonus mission completed by <<2>>. You receive <<1>> experience.
Bonus mission completed by <<2>>. You receive <<1[/$d social point/$d social points]>>.
You have entered a Rest Area. Only Subscribers gain Rest Experience while in a Rest Area.
You are currently earning experience at <<1>>% from a server-wide increased experience event (Time Remaining: <<2>>). During this time rest experience will not be applied or consumed.
You are currently earning 12x experience from class missions.
You are currently earning command experience at a bonus of +<<1>>% due to a server wide event. (Time Remaining: <<2>>).
Command Points
Command XP
Command Rank: <<1>> <<2>> / <<3>> Command XP
You are earning experience at <<1>>% from a server-wide event. During this time rest experience will not be applied or consumed.
You are currently earning command experience at a bonus of +<<1>>% due to a server wide event.
